title: A "font" by any other name?
content:
I'm doing a survey on how people use terms such as "font" and "typeface," and I'd appreciate more input.

See my blog for details: [http://www.thomasphinney.com/2009/02/font-name/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173148/http:/www.thomasphinney.com/2009/02/font-name/ "http://www.thomasphinney.com/2009/02/font-name/")

Cheers,

T
author: Thomas Phinney
